projects.title: Instagram | Social Media App
projects.description: I developed an Instagram Clone, a full-stack web application replicating the core features of Instagram. The project focuses on providing a seamless user experience while incorporating real-time functionalities and modern web technologies
projects.tags: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, Socket.IO, Prisma, JSON Web Token, ShadCN, Tailwind CSS, Cloudinary

projects.title: Medium | Blog App
projects.description: Developed a web application inspired by Medium for users to create, publish and read blog posts. Implemented frontend using React.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for styling.Utilized Cloudflare Workers for the backend, integrating Zod for data validation and Prisma for database operations with PostgreSQL.
projects.tags: React, HonoJs, Cloudflare workers, Zod, TypeScript, Prisma(ORM), PostgreSQL, JsonWebToken, Markdown Editor

projects.title: Repay | Paytm Wallet Clone
projects.description: Implemented user authentication and authorization using HonoJs and postgreSQl, with input validation using Zod.Ensured data integrity through atomic transactions and session management in MongoDB, track transactions as well. Enabled user search for seamless money transfers, with an intuitive React frontend styled using Tailwind CSS.
projects.tags: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, Socket.IO, Prisma, JSON Web Token, ShadCN, Tailwind CSS, Cloudinary

projects.title: 50xCourses | Course App
projects.description: Course marketplace where admins can upload courses and classes, and users can browse, buy, and take classes. Create and publish unlimited courses. Implemented beautifully designed React components for enhanced user experience. Integrated  for seamless user authentication and registration
projects.tags: TypeScript, Next.js, TailwindCSS/ShadcnUI, Prisma, PostgreSQL,Prisma, JsonWebToken, Cloudinary

projects.title: 50xOpportunities | Job Portal
projects.description: Job portal allowing admins to post job listings and users to search and apply for jobs. Create and find unlimited Jobs Opportunities. Implemented beautifully designed React components for enhanced user experience. Seamless user authentication and registration
